Class ControllerTwo

java.lang.Object
ControllerTwo
public class ControllerTwo
extends java.lang.Object
This is the heart of the program, the garden workspace. Here the user can create, save, and load their own custom garden.
Author:
Raj Trivedi, Noah Hodgson, Luis Figueroa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ControllerTwo​(java.io.File bg, javafx.stage.Stage stage, java.lang.String height, java.lang.String width)
    Initializes the instance variables This constructor is for creating a new garden
    ControllerTwo​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Garden userSavedGarden)
    Initializes the instance variables This constructor is for loading in a garden

    • getUnhappyPlants

      public java.lang.String getUnhappyPlants()
      Goes through all of the plants in the garden and if they have needs unmet adds them to a string that gets put in the report pop-up.
      Returns:
      returns a string that tells user all the plants that are unhappy and what they need.
